name: 3D Platformer Tutorial (miabodenhorn)
description:
This is my 3D-Platformer Project: Tutorial Submission

Currently Includes:

- Three different types of enemies: Ground Chaser, Ground Shooter, Flying Bot, and  Flying Bot with Way Points. 

- Two levels to beat

All of the finishing modifications have not yet been completed, this game is still in development.

After development, the game will include:

-Three different levels

-More enemies to beat in level 2 and level 3, and more obstacles for the player to face.

-Possible reskin of graphics

Credits:

Created by Mia Bodenhorn
